S0172.FORM.  1. FORM A QUESTIONNAIRE 2. FORM B QUESTIONNAIRE

S0172.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRAD? (PUT A CHECK IN FRONT OF THE ANSWER SHOWING YOUR PRESENT GRADE.)  1. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 2. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 3. SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE 4. 1ST THREE GRADES 0. NO ANSWER

S0172.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  01. 18 YEARS OLD 02. 19 YEARS OLD 03. 20 YEARS OLD 04. 21 YEARS OLD 05. 22 YEARS OLD 06. 23 YEARS OLD 07. 24 YEARS OLD 08. 25 YEARS OLD 09. 26-29 YEARS OLD 10. 30-34 YEARS OLD 11. 35 AND OVER 00. NO ANSWER

S0172.Q3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. DID NOT FINISH GRADE SCHOOL 2. GRADUATED FROM GRADE SCHOOL 3. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT GRADUATE 4. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 5. WENT TO COLLEGE 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0172.Q4. HOW DID YOU COME INTO THE ARM?  1. I VOLUNTEERED FOR THE REGULAR ARMY 2. I VOLUNTEERED THROUGH SELECTIVE SERVICE 3. I WAS IN THE NATIONAL GUARD 4. I WAS DRAFTED 5. SOME OTHER WAY 0. NO ANSWER
S0172.Q5. WERE YOU SENT BACK TO THE STATES UNDER THE ROTATION PLAN OR FOR SOME OTHER REASO?  1. I WAS SENT BACK UNDER THE ROTATION PLAN 2. I WAS SENT BACK FOR SOME OTHER REASON 0. NO ANSWER

S0172.Q6. HOW LONG WERE YOU OVERSEA? (COUNT FROM THE TIME YOU LEFT THE STATES UNTIL YOU RETURNED.)  1. 12 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 12 MONTHS TO 18 MONTHS 3. OVER 18 MONTHS TO 24 MONTHS 4. OVER 24 MONTHS TO 30 MONTHS 5. OVER 30 MONTHS TO 36 MONTHS 6. OVER 36 MONTHS 0. NO ANSWER

S0172.Q7. WHAT WAS THE BRANCH OF SERVICE THAT YOU WERE LAST IN WHILE YOU WERE OVERSEA?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY 09. ANTI-AIRCRAFT 10. AIR CORPS 11. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 12. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 13. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 14. MILITARY POLICE 15. TANK DESTROYER 16. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

S0172.Q8. IN WHAT OVERSEAS THEATER OR AREA DID YOU LAST SERV? (CHECK THE ONE IN WHICH YOU WERE LAST ON DUTY.)  01. EUROPEAN THEATRE (BRITISH ISLES, FRANCE) 02. MEDITERRANEAN THEATRE (ITALY, NORTH AFRICA) 03. CARIBBEAN, PANAMA 04. SOUTHWEST PACIFIC AREA (AUSTRALIA, NEW GUINEA) 05. SOUTH PACIFIC BASE COMMAND (NEW CALEDONIA, GUADALCANAL, ETC.) 06. CENTRAL PACIFIC BASE COMMAND (HAWAII, KWAJALEIN, SAIPAN, ETC.) 07. ALASKA, ALEUTIANS 08. MIDDLE EAST (CAIRO, PALESTINE, IRAN) 09. CHINA, BURMA, INDIA 10. OTHER PLACE 00. NO ANSWER
S0172.Q9. WAS THIS THE OVERSEAS THEATER OR AREA YOU SERVED IN LONGES?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S0172.Q10. HAVE YOU BEEN IN COMBAT OR UNDER ENEMY FIRE IN THIS WA?  1. NO 2. YES, I HAVE BEEN UNDER ENEMY FIRE, BUT NOT IN ACTUAL COMBAT 3. YES, I HAVE BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 11A AND 11B CODED TOGETHER.

S0172.Q11A. DID YOU SEE ANY EVIDENCE IN YOUR OVERSEAS AREA THAT REPLACEMENT DEPOTS WERE NOT RUN AS WELL AS THEY COULD HAVE BEEN UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCE? (NO, I DID NOT SEE ANY EVIDENCE OF THIS; YES, I SAW SOME EVIDENCE OF THIS, BUT NOT MUCH; YES, I SAW LOTS OF EVIDENCE OF THIS)  Q.11B. HOW MUCH DID SEEING THIS BOTHER YO? (VERY MUCH; QUITE A BIT; NOT SO MUCH; NOT AT ALL; I DID NOT SEE ANY EVIDENCE OF THIS)  01. NO TO PART A, ANY ANSWER TO PART B 02. YES, SOME AND VERY MUCH 03. YES, SOME AND QUITE A BIT 04. YES, SOME AND NOT SO MUCH 05. YES, SOME AND NOT AT ALL 06. YES, LOTS AND VERY MUCH 07. YES, LOTS AND QUITE A BIT 08. YES, LOTS AND NOT SO MUCH 09. YES, LOTS AND NOT AT ALL 10. NO ANSWER ON BOTH A AND B 11. YES, SOME AND NO ANSWER 12. YES, LOTS AND NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 12A AND 12B CODED TOGETHER.

S0172.Q23A. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY THE MORALE WAS IN YOUR OVERSEAS OUTFI?  1. VERY HIGH 2. FAIRLY HIGH 3. JUST SO-SO 4. FAIRLY LOW 5. VERY LOW 0. NO ANSWER X. Q.23B AND Q.24 NOT CODED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION.

S0172.Q25. ON THE WHOLE, WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE IDEA OF HAVING SUCH REDISTRIBUTION STATIONS AS THIS ONE FOR RETURNING SOLDIER?  1. IT IS A GOOD IDEA IN ALL WAYS 2. IT IS A GOOD IDEA IN MOST WAYS, BUT NOT IN OTHER WAYS 3. IT IS A POOR IDEA IN MOST WAYS, BUT NOT IN OTHER WAYS 4. IT IS A POOR IDEA IN ALL WAYS 0. NO ANSWER

S0172.Q26. HOW DOES THE TREATMENT YOU GET FROM ARMY PERSONNEL HERE COMPARE WITH THE TREATMENT YOU RECEIVED FROM ARMY PERSONNEL IN MOST OTHER ARMY INSTALLATIONS YOU HAVE BEEN I?  1. IT IS BETTER HERE 2. IT IS ABOUT THE SAME 3. IT IS WORSE HERE 0. NO ANSWER

S0172.Q28. AFTER THE WAR, DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES SHOULD DRAFT ALL YOUNG MEN FOR A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF ARMY TRAINING DURING PEACETIME OR SHOULD WE GO BACK TO THE REGULAR ARMY SYSTEM OF TAKING VOLUNTEERS ONL?  1. DRAFT ALL YOUNG MEN FOR A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF TRAINING 2. GO BACK TO TAKING VOLUNTEERS ONLY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0172.Q29. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF PHYSICAL CONDITION WOULD YOU SAY YOU ARE IN AT THE PRESENT TIM?  1. VERY GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 2. GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 3. FAIR PHYSICAL CONDITION 4. POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 5. VERY POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 0. NO ANSWER P. THE OFFICE OF THE SURGEON GENERAL IS INTERESTED IN FINDING OUT ABOUT THE HEALTH OF SOLDIERS LIKE YOURSELF. PLEASE ANSWER THESE QUESTIONS CAREFULLY EVEN THOUGH SOME OF THEM MAY SOUND STRANGE TO YOU.
S0172.Q30A. ARE YOU EVER TROUBLED BY YOUR HANDS SWEATING SO THAT THEY FEEL DAMP AND CLAMM?  1. YES, OFTEN 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0172.Q30B. HOW OFTEN ARE YOU BOTHERED BY HAVING AN UPSET STOMAC?  1. NEARLY ALL THE TIME 2. PRETTY OFTEN 3. NOT VERY OFTEN 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0172.Q30C. DO YOU OFTEN HAVE TROUBLE IN GETTING TO SLEEP OR STAYING ASLEE?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0172.Q30D. DO YOUR HANDS EVER TREMBLE ENOUGH TO BOTHER YO?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0172.Q30E. ARE YOU EVER BOTHERED BY NERVOUSNES?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0172.Q30F. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED AND UPSE?  1. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET 0. NO ANSWER
S0172.Q30G. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARM?  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT'S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 0. NO ANSWER

S0172.Q30H. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRIT?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER
